EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send notification internally the InformRMS upgrade was completed.
EmailTemplate.name: RMS Web Upgrade Completed - Internal
EmailTemplate.subject: RMS Web Upgrade Completed - Internal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Account} {!Case.Environment_Type__c} {!Case.Product} Upgraded {!Case.Upgrade_Start_Version__c} to {!Case.Upgrade_End_Version__c}
Agency Name: {!Case.Account}
Contact Names: {!Case.Contact} {!Case.Upgrade_Contact__c}
Work Completed: Inform RMS Client to Client Patches: RMS Integration Inform RMS Web [Upgrade Start Version] to [Upgrade End Version] Web Patches: InformRMS API ( [Upgrade End Version] / None Syncs Started / Completed
Environment Type: {!Case.Environment_Type__c}
Workstations/Clients Upgraded: (Yes, on Classic Server) (Yes, with customer over the phone) (n/a)
Issues Encountered:
Issues Outstanding:
Classic Date and Time Started:
Classic Date and Time Completed:
Total Classic Server Duration:
RMSWeb Date and Time Started:
RMSWeb Date and Time Completed:
Total Web Server Duration:
Patch Install Duration:
Total Downtime:
Sales Order Number: N/A
Work Order Link for Classic:
Work Order Link for RMSWeb:
Confirmation hardware/software records updated: (must enter yes) Yes
